posts.raw_content: The indoctrination isn't new.  It was going on in the 2000s and earlier.  If you're going to send your children to college, you need to research where your child is going.  Not doing so is really irresponsible and can result in terrible consequences.  Look at the college newspapers online, see if the university has a department for diversity, and know who the administrators and professors are because once your children are at that university, you can't undo the propaganda.
posts.author: gurtfutjer
posts.title: Parents, I'm asking you to consider not sending your children to college.  It's not just the Ivy League.  If you really look into every college, you'll see they're almost all bad, and it isn't worth it for your children to get the propaganda.
posts.content: The indoctrination isn't new. It was going on in the 2000s and earlier. If you're going to send your children to college, you need to research where your child is going.
